== Edakkazhiyur (CT) (627796) ==

Edakkazhiyur (CT) is a town in the [[Chavakkad]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 7.25 sq. km. and harbouring 3473 households with total population of 17335 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 31 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 311 km. Male population is 8093 and female population is 9242. Scheduled Caste population is 1287 and Scheduled Tribes population is 37. Census Location Code of the town is 627796<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 31 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 110 km. Railway station is at Guruvayoor at a distance of 9 km.
